name: Anti-anti-automation Framework
body: Anti-Anti-Automation Framework ==================== A framework for techniques to bypass common anti-automation security controls. ####Common Anti-Automation Controls#### - Email Verification - CAPTCHA - SMS/Phone - Credit Card WASC-21: Insufficient Anti-automation - http://projects.webappsec.org/w/page/13246938/Insufficient%20Anti-automation WE-799: Improper Control of Interaction Frequency - http://cwe.mitre.org/data/definitions/799.html
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
